El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar llantas, grasa, rines, llaves, tuercas, etc.   para para dar una mejor atención a los clientes, ya que  existe mayor demanda en los vehículos que repara y no tiene los suficientes materiales y herramientas para darle una pronta respuesta a los clientes que lo necesiten.


Espera en una vida proposicional tener su propio taller con una buena infraestructura y con los suficientes materiales para dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, y para el próximo año le dará el estudio a su hija que espera que sea un profesional ya que eso le inculcaron sus padres.
texts.en:
José is 32 years old. Thanks to his parents, he was able to study until his third year of high school. Later he studied to be a technical mechanic, as which he later dedicated himself to working. His life partner works as a domestic servant. They have one young daughter who will begin school next year. José worked for three as a mechanic in the city where he had to travel every day. It used to take him from very early in the morning until the evening. Later, he began to serve clients on his own in a workshop that was putting together, buying tools to work with. José learned this profession in school but it was in a friend's workshop that he gained experience in this trade. 

The loan José is requesting will help him buy tires, grease, rims, keys, screws, etc. to help him better serve his customers since there is now more demand for vehicle repairs and he does not have enough materials and tools to promptly serve the customers that need him.

José hopes that in the future he will have his own workshop with good infrastructure and with enough materials to provide better customer service. Next year, he hopes to pay to send his daughter to school. He hopes she will become a professional like her parents are raising her to be.

loans.use: to buy tires, grease, rims, keys, screws, etc. to better serve his clients now that there is more demand for his car repairs.

loans.name: Bartolome

texts.es:
Bartolomé, es acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida y 5 hijos, día a día se esfuerza por dar a su familia lo mejor; su manera de generar ingresos es por medio de brindar el servicio de reparación de bicicletas y venta de repuestos para la mismas, ofició que aprendió de su padre, trabaja en un horario de 8:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m., ya tiene 16 años de contar son su negocio.
Comprará grasa, piñones mecánicos, pedales, baleros, cadenas, parches, etc., le ayudara a surtir su negocio  con los implementos necesarios para recuperar y mantener a sus clientes satisfechos, espera recuperar lo invertido con un buen margen de ganancia para cancelar su deuda y seguir cubriendo las necesidades de su familia.
Su visión es ampliar su negocio para aumentar su rentabilidad y ofrecer a su familia una vida más confortable.
texts.en:
Bartolomé lives with his life partner and 5 children.  Day after day, he works hard to give his family the best, bringing in income by providing bicycle repair services and selling spare parts, a trade that he learned from his father.  His work schedule runs from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m..  He has 16 years of experience in this business.    

He will use this loan to buy grease, mechanical pinions, pedals, ball bearings, chains, patches, and other bicycle repair materials, which will help him to supply his business with the necessary tools to catch up and keep his clients satisfied.  He hopes to recuperate this investment by a large margin of profit to pay off his debt and continue providing for his family's needs.

His vision is to expand his business in order to increase its profitability and offer his family a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy grease, mechanical pinions, pedals, ball bearings, chains, patches, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sandwich cart

loans.name: Tumanyane Group

texts.en:
Peace is an old client age 40 years, and a member of Tumanyane group. She has applied for a loan of 500,000 Uganda shillings (UGX) (Five hundred thousand shillings only) to buy fertilizers to fertilize her banana plantation. She is a farmer who grows bananas and rears cows for milk.

Peace is married with two children aged 19 and 11 years, who both attend school at the moment. She is a hardworking woman from rural Kyamuhunga, Igara Bushenyi and her clients are the town people who buy matooke (green plantains) and milk for food. She is also a salary earner from a nearby Hospital as a nursing assistant. She hopes to be financially stable and educate her children through her hard work in the near future. 

Peace is faced with the challenge of unfavorable conditions which are unpredictable, but is determined to do her best and achieve her targets with continuous financial boost from UGAFODE partnering with Kiva lenders. Fourth from the left is the Ugafode credit officer with the group members.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers.

loans.name: María Catalina

texts.es: María tiene 56 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus seis hijos de 24 años, 22 años, 21 años, 20 años, 15 años, y 13 años de edad. María es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se gana la vida por medio una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Con el deseo deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto para lo cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en: María is 56 years old and lives in a house that she owns, along with her six children ages 24, 22, 21, 20, 15, and 13 years old. María is a hardworking woman who has earned a living running a store that she worked hard to establish. With the desire to improve the conditions of her home, she has decided to request this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the construction of a room. For this she needs materials such as bricks, cement, sand, and iron.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron to build a room.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blenders, griddles, a stove, meats, condiments, rice, cabbage, lettuce, etc., for her business

loans.name: Calisto

texts.en:
Calisto is 59 years old and married to Jennifer. They are blessed with six children between 16 and 30 years, respectively.

For the last 14 years, Calisto has been in the farming business, especially planting sugarcane and selling it later after the plants mature. He has applied for his ninth loan of KES 31,500 to pay school fees for his children.

In the near future, he will grow his business and give his children the best education.

loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 50 years old and married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Rebecca has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers.

Rebecca has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Rebecca would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Yousef

texts.en:
Yousef is 21 years old living with his family consisting of four members in Irbed/Jordan. He is a university student in his second year studying Finance.

Because he faced many problems in paying the semester fees, Yousef applied for educational loan to support and help him pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn has a live-in partner with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 43 years old and has four children who are in school.

Roselyn has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase an additional bicycle for her business.

Roselyn has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional bicycle for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a bedroom set and a living room set

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Hello lenders! Meet Robert, a passionate, hardworking smallholder farmer from Murang’a, which is a coffee producing area in Kenya. Robert is very ingrained to coffee farming. For the last 10 years, he has supported his family of children through income he generates from selling coffee. 

The major challenge Robert is facing as a farmer is unavailability of cheap and affordable labor. He is forced to handle most of the work by himself. For this reason, he decided to purchase some assets that will make his work easier. Robert is seeking a loan from KIVA through Juhudi Kilimo to purchase a water pump and farm implements.

The water pump will replace the labor required to fetch and water the crops on his farm. Better improved farm implements will make Robert’s hobby of tilling coffee land more effective and efficient.

With your loan, Robert projects he will improve the quality of work and cut labor costs. This translates to more income for him and his family. The profits will be reinvested back into the agri-business to ensure continued improvements. His family will also realize an improvement in living standards.

loans.use: To purchase a water pump and farm implements.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.en:
Soledad works hard to support her family. She is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Soledad requested a loan of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional materials like fabric, threads, and zippers for her business. She has been in this business for 22 years now.

Soledad would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like fabric, threads, and zippers for her business.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Hello world, meet Patrick. He is a husband, a father, and a smallholder farmer who resides in Kerugoya on a small piece of land together with his family. Patrick has been passionately practicing mixed-farming for the past 6 years. His primary income sources are milk, tea, greeneries, and other personal businesses.

Patrick stated that he enjoys keeping cattle: He names all animals in his farm. His biggest challenge is the marketing of farm produce. He is seeking a loan to purchase chaff cutter and farm implements. A chaff cutter will be used to chop fodder into small pieces for a compact storage and to make it more digestible. He will employ the farm implements to prepare proper seed bed for the various crops he plants. 

With your loan, Patrick will be able to greatly improve the state of his farm and increase milk production. This will provide him with more income to meet his business related expenses. The loan will enable his family to have enough food both for consumption and for sale.

loans.use: To purchase chaff cutter and farm implements.

loans.name: Santos Alvaro

texts.es:
Santos de 46 años de edad, solo estudio hasta 6 grado de educación básica,  él ya no pudo seguir con sus estudios ya que cuando estudiaba, estaba en guerra el país y la fuerza armada lo recluto, y se lo llevaron al cuartel para prestar su servicio militar durante 10 años para defender la patria de su país.

Esta acompañado su esposa de dedica a vender comida en el mercado de su municipio, y tienen 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando y son los que dependen de ellos.

Santos ahora trabaja como despachador de buses y pick-up en su municipio de residencia, él trabaja de 6 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde. 

Él tiene 4 años de dedicarse a este trabajo y anteriormente se dedicaba al trabajo de la agricultura cuando no tenía este empleo.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar 2 camionadas de arena, 3 camionadas de piedra y 15 bolsas de cemento, para reparar su vivienda.

Él a futuro desea tener una vivienda digna que le permita a su familia un mejor estilo de vida, que le proporcione seguridad para su familia, limpieza, protección, salud, y así llevar un estilo de mejor al que tenía antes.
texts.en:
Santos is 46 years old, he only studied until the 6th grade of basic education. He could not continue his studies because when he was studying there was a war in the country and the armed forces recruited him. He was taken to the barracks to give military service for 10 years to defend the homeland of his country.

He is married, and his wife makes a living selling food in the market in their town. They have 3 children who are studying and are their dependents. Santos now works as a dispatcher for buses and trucks in the town where he lives. He works from six in the morning to four in the afternoon. He has been working at this job for 4 years now, and he previously worked in agriculture when he didn't have this employment.

The loan he is requesting is to buy 2 truckloads of sand, 3 truckloads of rock, and 15 bags of cement to repair his home. In the future he wants to have a worthy home that allows his family to have a better quality of life. One that provides security for his family, cleanliness, protection, and health, and this way brings a better quality than had existed before.

loans.use: to buy 2 truckloads of sand, 3 truckloads of rock, and 15 bags of cement to repair his home

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 28 years old and has a live-in partner with three children. Teresa works very hard to provide for them.

Teresa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional items like snack foods, soft-drinks, candies, biscuits, and coffee to sell.

Teresa has been in this business for 2 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, soft-drinks, candies, biscuits, coffee, etc. 

In the future, Teresa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items like snack foods, soft-drinks, candies, biscuits, and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Thelma requested a loan of 12,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business. She has been in this business for 5 years now.

Thelma would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 43 years old and married with three children.

Virginia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 11,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase additional stock of products like diapers, sanitary pads, coffee, detergent soap, shampoo, and fabric conditioner to sell.

Virginia has borrowed and repaid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from buying and selling firewood.

Virginia aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of products like diapers, sanitary pads, coffee, detergent soap, shampoo, and fabric conditioner to sell.

loans.name: José Benjamin

texts.es:
José de 20 años de edad, con mucho esfuerzo de él y de sus padres logro cursar hasta un noveno grado, luego ya no pudo estudiar debido a que tenia que ayudar a su madre quien es la responsable de todo el trabajo y tenia que ayudar con los gastos familiares, vive con su madre y sus dos hermanos menores a los que apoya para que estudien.

José trabaja en conjunto con su madre, el cultivo de 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, trabajan todos los días desde la mañana hasta el atardecer esto los realizan en época de invierno y en la época de verano trabajan solamente 7,000; pero esta la venden para elote, también se dedica a trabajar como jornalero, todos los días tiene que llegar muy temprano, para  ordeñar las vacas, luego trasladarlas donde tiene que comer por la tarde regresa a traerlas.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar abonos, fertilizantes y para preparar la tierra para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz 


Las aspiraciones a futuro de José,  es comprar un terreno para construir una casa y ayudar a su madre y a sus hermanos en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
José is 20 years old. With much dedication from both him and his parents, he was able to finish the 9th grade. After that he was not able to finish his studies due to the fact that he had to help his mother, who was responsible for all of the work. José needed to help with the household expenses. José lives with his mother and his two youngest siblings, who he supports so that they can study. 

José works with his mother to cultivate 14,000 square meters of corn. They work every day from early in the morning until sunset. They work on all of them during the winter season, but but in the summer they only work on 7,000 meters, from which they sell corn. José also works as a day laborer. Each day he has to arrive very early to take care of the cows then to move them to an area where they can graze. Later he brings them back.

The loan José is requesting from CREDICAMPO, is to buy composts, fertilizers, and to prepare his land to cultivate 7,000 meters of corn. 

José's future aspirations include buying a plot of land to build a house and help his mother and his siblings keep up with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, and to prepare the land to cultivate 7,000 meters of corn.

loans.name: Rebeca

texts.es:
Rebeca es una mujer soltera de 27 años de edad madre de 2 niños.
Terminó los estudios secundarios y comenzó la universidad, tuvo que dejar sus estudios en ventas por el nacimiento de su niño mayor (8), al paso de 2 años y con el apoyo de sus familiares pudo crear su propio negocio en la venta de perfumes  y comenzar a producir ganancias.
Ella se dedica mucho a sus hijos, ahora tiene un bebe de 8 meses y no repara gastos en ambos,  el crecimiento de su negocio se debe en parte a la necesidades de su familia; “hago todo por mis hijos sin ellos no estaría inspirada por mejorar y seguir creciendo en el campo de las ventas”
Rebeca afirma que su negocio se maneja solito, porque cuenta con muchos clientes que la llaman para adquirir nuevos productos, también conoce a la competencia y tiene la confianza de estar a la vanguardia, pero para continuar se siente en la necesidad de adquirir nueva mercadería.
Rebeca tiene un sueño; “tener una tienda reconocida a nivel nacional y ser la única distribuidora de la marca”
Es por ese motivo que Rebeca solicita un préstamo para la compra de mayor cantidad de perfumes para cumplir sus metas y sueños.
texts.en:
Rebeca is a single woman of 27, and she is the mother of two children.

She finished her secondary school studies and began studying at the university. She had to leave her education in sales because of the birth of her older son (8). After two years had passed and with the help of her family, she was able to create her own business selling perfumes and to begin to produce earnings.

She is very dedicated to her children. Now she has a baby of 8 months, and she doesn't spare expenses on the two children. The growth of her business is due in part to the needs of her family: "I do everything for my children; without them I would not be inspired to improve and to continue growing in the field of sales."

Rebeca states that her business manages itself, because she has many customers who call her to acquire new products. She also knows the competition and has the confidence to be at the forefront, but in order to continue, she feels the need to acquire new merchandise.

Rebeca has a dream: "to have a store that is well known at the national level and to be the only distributor of the brand."

It is for this reason that Rebeca is applying for a loan to purchase a greater quantity of perfumes to accomplish her goals and dreams.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of perfumes.

loans.name: Clara Nimia

texts.es: Clara tiene 46 años de edad y habita junto a sus dos hijos de 25 años y 18 años de edad. Clara trabaja en una institución cercana a su localidad lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su familia. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica en un cuarto y para encementar el piso del mismo. Espera poder constar con este financiamiento y así poder proceder a las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Clara is 46 years old and lives with her two 25 and 18 year-old sons.  She works in an institution near her home which allows her to provide sustenance for her family.

With the aim of improving her quality of life, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the installation of electricity and a cement floor in a room.  She hopes that this loan will allow her to move forward with these improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to cement the floor in a room and to install electricity

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw fish, chicken, pigs-feet, etc.

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is a widow in her 40s living in a rented house in Wihdat/Jordan. She has 3 sons 
And one of her sons makes desserts.

Sahar started her own business selling home products to her neighbors. But she doesn't have enough money to finance her project. So she applied to this loan to help her buy more goods and increase her family income.

loans.use: To buy more home products for her business

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana es una mujer de 36 años de edad casada y madre de 4 hijos.
Toda su vida la ocupó trabajando en la venta de api (desayuno caliente a base de maíz morado y maíz blanco).
Todos los días junto a sus hijos transporta su hornilla y garrafa de gas empujando un carrito de dos ruedas desde su domicilio hasta la parada de minibuses de la localidad de batallas, Todo debe estar listo a partir de las 6am, hora en la cual la afluencia de viajeros es grande.
Susana extraña mucho a su hijo mayor (18) que se encuentra realizando su servicio militar al que sólo vé los domingos porque los demás días está encerrado en su cuartel.
En su puesto de trabajo todos la conocen y la aprecian, es muy común que ella invite un vasito de api a sus clientes y por eso es muy querida. Susana quiere hacer una inversión para mejorar sus ingresos, ella necesita comprar los insumos diarios de su negocio por mayor, esto le abarataría los costos y ahorraría tiempo.
Es por ese motivo que Susana solicita un préstamos  para la compra de harina y azúcar por mayor y de esa forma mejoraría sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Susana is a 36 year old married woman and mother of four children. For her whole life she has worked selling api (a hot breakfast made from blue and white corn). Every day, she and her children transport her stove and gas tank by pushing a two wheeled cart from their house to the minibus stop in the small town of Batallas. Everything needs to be ready by 6am, a time when there is a large number of passengers.

Susana misses her oldest son (18 yrs) a lot. He is fulfilling his military service, and she only sees him on Sundays since on the rest of the days he is confined to the barracks.

In her workplace, everyone knows her and thinks highly of her. It's very normal for her to treat her customers to a small glass of api and that's why she is very loved. Susana would like to make an investment to improve her income. She needs to buy the daily supplies for her business in bulk, which would lower her costs and save time. It is for this reason that Susana is requesting a loan to buy cornmeal and sugar in bulk, and in this way improve her income and her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cornmeal and sugar in bulk.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is single and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Virginia requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials and ingredients for her food vending business.

Virginia has been in this business for 7 years now.

In the future, Virginia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Twanzana Kasenyi Group

texts.en:
Wilson, age 32, is a member of Twanzana group and a first-time borrower. He does a retail business in addition to farming. He is thankful to the group members for standing by his side even when he didn't have any security. He has applied for a loan of 700,000 (seven hundred thousand) shillings only. 

He is married with four children and one dependant who is an orphan and all attend school at the moment. He started his retail business in the year 2003 with high hopes of getting a high income to educate his five children and look after his family. He is a hardworking man with an additional business, a butcher shop, selling pork. He is faced with a challenge of competition from other retailers. His business is in his local cell of residence, by the lake shores. His major clients are the people around the landing site. Despite the challenge of competition, Wilson is determined to work hard and out compete his competitors to be able to achieve his long time dream. He hopes to use the loan money to buy more items to sell in his retail business. Thank you Kiva lenders for the job wel done

loans.use: To  buy items to sell in the retail shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and biscuits to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more brooms and local shampoo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more chairs to expand her business.

loans.name: Kihungye Tukore Hamwe Group

texts.en:
Esau is a new client aged 55 years old and is a member of Kihungye Tukorehamwe group. 

He is married with four children aged 18, 16, 14 and 10 years old and all of them attend school. He is a hardworking farmer from rural Mitooma District while his clients are the people in Mitooma and Kashenshero town. He has applied for a loan of 500,000 UGX (five hundred thousand shillings) to buy organic fertilizers to use in his plantations. He is faced with the challenge of drought and banana diseases that have greatly affected his crops.  However, he has engaged in coffee planting and animal rearing to supplement the business since his banana plantation has been affected. When given the loan money, he hopes to get high quality yields while in the long run becoming financially stable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is shrewd and hardworking. She has borrowed from UGAFODE four times. She always wanted to be a businesswoman but because she had limited capital, she opted for groceries that didn't require much cash. She has been able to reap some profits because of her dedication and good customer service. But because of the high cost of doing business in the city, she is forced to borrow and therefore opted for UGAFODE. She thanks UGAFODE for being willing to lend to her despite her small business. She is focused on growing her business now that she has funders in the name of Kiva lenders. She is hardworking and resilient.

loans.use: To buy groceries to sell

loans.name: Anush

texts.en: Anush is self-employed and is from Vernashen village in the Vayots Dzor region of Armenia. She lives with her husband and their 25-year-old son who is an army officer. Anush's family has been engaged in animal husbandry for 5 years already. During this period, she has had a really good credit history with no delinquent days. Now the family's agribusiness needs some investments in order to expand and function in an efficient way. A loan of 2,800 USD will be a great support to this hard-working woman and her family, enabling them to purchase livestock and finance soil plowing activities, specifically to pay for fuel and compensate their employees. Let's help this hard-working family expand their agribusiness. They really need support to succeed and will be really grateful to all the lenders.

loans.use: to buy livestock and pay for soil plowing activities.

location.town: Vernashen village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more blood syrup, malarial drugs and pain tablets to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gallons of palm oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more green vegetables to expand her business.

loans.name: Las Malvinas Group

texts.es: Carina de 42 años de edad es separada con 02 hijos dependientes. La Alcancía Comunal “Las Malvinas” está formado por 08 socios responsables y emprendedores. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de plásticos. Su mayor anhelo es ampliar su negocio incrementando así el volumen de sus productos. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de insumos y materiales. El grupo “Las Malvinas” agradecen a todas las personas que facilitaron este crédito. Carina se encuentra sentada es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste casaca negra.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Las Malvinas” consists of eight responsible and enterprising members.

Carina is 42 years old, separated from her spouse, and has two dependent children. She makes and sells plastic goods. Her greatest wish is to expand her business by increasing her volume of products. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies and materials.

The group “Las Malvinas” is grateful to everyone who facilitated this loan. In the photo, Carina is seated in the first position on the left-hand side and is wearing a black jacket.

loans.use: to buy supplies and materials for making plastic goods.

loans.name: Knarik

texts.en: Knarik is a teacher at Vedi Music School. She lives with her husband, her son, and her daughter. In addition to her main job, Knarik has been engaged in agricultural activities for 10 years. In particular, she has been farming with other family members. Now they are planning to expand their agribusiness and make their work process more efficient. With such an initiative, they have requested a loan of 3000 U.S. dollars (USD) to pay for plowing activities, fertilizers, seeds, water, and employee compensation. As this is Knarik's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for plowing activities, fertilizers, seeds, labor, and water

loans.name: Edita

texts.es:
Edita tiene 25 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo en el Caserío Ayahuaca, una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de víveres, desde hace 2 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, cuenta con clientela considerable, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de productos que le permitan ofrecerlo a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Edita is 25 years old and lives with her son in the village of Ayahuaca, a rural area in the District of Pucará. The residents engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This community is located in Jaén Province, which is part of the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

Edita has been selling provisions for two years. Her business is located in her home and she has a considerable clientele. She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1,000 PEN so that she can buy a larger quantity of products that she can offer to her customers. As a result, she will generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of products for her store.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
Felipa es una mujer de 35 años de edad soltera y sin hijos.
Su vida la dedica al comercio de jugos y bebidas, cuando era joven un familiar la empleo para la venta de jugos y refrescos naturales, fue ahí donde conoció el negocio y quiso mejorarlo. Se dio cuenta que los jugos elaborados en forma manual y natural tenían muchos problemas de conservación al no tener conservantes se echaban a perder y también jugaba un papel muy importante el estado del tiempo y la estación del año, fue por esos motivos que comenzó con el comercio de jugos elaborados industrialmente; “los jugos naturales se venden bastante bien, pero la compra de la fruta y el transporte diario es un problema…” comenta.
Felipa fue cambiando la forma de su negocio a través de su iniciativa y sus posibilidades, ella desea continuar con el crecimiento de su negocio por eso encuentra la necesidad de elaborar compras por mayor.
Es por ese motivo que Felipa solicita un préstamos para la compra de jugos y bebidas por mayor.
texts.en:
Felipa is a 35 year-old single woman without children.  She makes a living selling juices and other drinks.  When she was young, she worked for a family member selling juices and natural soft drinks, where she came to know the business and wanted to make it better.  

She realized that juices made by hand in a natural way had a lot of problems with spoiling because they don't contain preservatives.  She found that differences in the time and season of the year also played an important role.  For these reasons, she started a business producing juices industrially.  She says that natural juices sell pretty well, but buying fruit and daily transport is a problem.  

Felipa went about reshaping her business through her intiative and potential.  She wants to continue to grow her business and she finds it necessary to make wholesale goods in order to do that.  Therefore, she is asking for a loan to buy juices and other drinks wholesale.

loans.use: to buy juices and drinks wholesale

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
Marcial tiene 68 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y tiene una hija de 17 años a su cargo, su casa es propia de material rustico ubicada en El Caserío de San Sebastian- Zaña, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno y siembra de tubérculos ( yuca), tiene muchos años de experiencias en estas actividades, su esposa le apoya en el comercio en los restaurants del distrito de Zaña, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra semillas de alfalfa para luego de cultivarlo ofrecerlo a la venta puerta a puerta en su distrito y de esta manera generar ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Marcial is 68 years old and lives with his wife. He has a 17-year-old daughter who is under his care. His house is made of basic materials and is located in the village of San Sebastian-Zaña. The residents engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This community is located in Chiclayo Province, which is part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Marcial raises cattle and cultivates tubers (cassava). He has many years of experience in both of these activities. His wife helps with selling his products to restaurants in the District of Zaña. Marcial is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2,000 PEN so that he can buy alfalfa seeds that he can cultivate. He can then sell his harvest door-to-door in his district, which would allow him to generate additional income for his family.

loans.use: to buy alfalfa seeds for cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks, and biscuits to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more goods such as cream, beans, butter, and grease

loans.name: Karla Guadalupe

texts.es: Karla de 39 años de edad se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su casa desde hace varios años trabaja de lunes a domingo, tiene mucha clientela pues es una persona muy trabajadora y amable, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, Karla solicita un credito para comprar maiz por quintales para seguir elaborando las tortillas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad economica con su familia.
texts.en:
Karla, 39, sells tortillas from home and has been in business for several years working Monday through Sunday.  She has many customers since she is a very hard worker and kind.  She uses the earnings from sales to cover household expenses.  She lives in her own home with her family.

Karla is requesting a loan to buy quintals of corn to continue making tortillas and earn a better profit for the family's economic stability.

loans.use: To buy quintals of corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To establish an improved pasture.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal and palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Josue Elíu

texts.es:
Josue de 25 años de edad, es un agricultor que vive en la zona rural.  Solo logro estudiar hasta 7° grado en la escuela. Él está acompañado y padre de dos hijos.

Josue posee mucha experiencia en la actividad productiva,  ya tiene 10 años de dedicarse al cultivo de maíz y este año tiene planeado cultivar tres hectáreas de terreno, ya tiene una parte del dinero dado que solo necesita $500.  El lugar donde trabaja le queda a una distancia de 200 metros y esta actividad fue enseñada por su padre quien falleció hace 7 años.

El crédito será invertido en la compra de insumos tales como abonos, insecticidas, herbicidas, entre otros, debido a que la temporada de siembra está muy cerca y necesita el capital de trabajo para invertir en el cultivo de maíz, ya que serán dos cosechas en el año los que trabajara.

Tiene planeado cultivar sus  tres hectáreas de terreno, ya que esta actividad le generara muchas ganancias y así podrá pagar su crédito sin problemas; además el próximo año uno de sus dos hijos empezara sus estudios y quiere estar preparado para comprar todos los útiles escolares y sabe que todo esto lo puede lograr con la ayuda y financiación de su crédito.
texts.en:
Josue, age 25, is a farmer who lives in a rural area. He only completed school through the seventh grade. Josue is in a relationship and is the father of two children.

He has plenty of experience in productive activities. Josue has been cultivating corn for 10 years. This year he plans to cultivate three hectares of land. He already has part of the money he needs, so he is only lacking $500. The place where he works is located 200 meters away. His father, who taught him this trade, died seven years ago.

His loan will be invested in the purchase of supplies such as compost, insecticides, herbicides, and other items. Since the planting season is approaching, he needs operating capital to invest in his corn crop. He plans to reap two harvests during this work year.

Josue plans to cultivate his three hectares of land, which will generate plenty of revenue. Therefore, he will be able to repay his loan without any problems. Next year, one of his two children will begin school, so he wants to be prepared by purchasing all of the school supplies. Josue knows that he can accomplish anything with the financial help of a loan.

loans.use: to buy compost, insecticides, herbicides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for her son's university diploma.

loans.name: Silvia Yanira

texts.es: Silvia tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Silvia es una mujer emprendedora quien se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos, además posee un negocio de venta de tortillas desde hace mucho tiempo. Su compañero de vida es jornalero y juntos van sacando adelante a su familia. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio de pollos, por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de 200 pollos y 7 sacos de concentrado.
texts.en:
Silvia, 49, lives in her own home with her common-law husband and children.  She is an enterprising woman who raises and sells chickens and also has a business telling tortillas that she has been in for several years.  Her husband is a day worker and between the two of them they are able to provide for the family.

In an effort to improve her living conditions, Silvia has decided to invest in her chicken business.  She is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy 200 chickens and seven sacks of animal feed concentrate.

loans.use: To buy 200 chickens and seven sacks of animal feed concentrate.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and biscuits to expand her business

loans.name: Darelis

texts.es: Darelis es una mujer joven que desde los 10 años se ha preocupado por ser productiva para su familia y es por eso que realizaba un trabajo con sus cerdos, perfeccionando sus técnicas de crianza para ser hoy en día una experimentada comerciante de cerdos, buscando una oportunidad para ser mejor de no solo conformarse con lo que tiene con la mentalidad de siempre buscar un mejor horizonte Darelis solicita un crédito para comprar cerdos los cuales alimentara y criara para sacar u n buen provecho por sus ventas con una única solución de progresar paso por paso, seguir firme en busca de una calidad de vida con la cual pueda tener a su familia viviendo cómodamente y sin faltarle nunca nada
texts.en:
Darelis is a young woman who was concerned about being productive for her family 10 years ago. For this reason, she started working with pigs and perfected her techniques for raising them. Today she is an experienced pig trader. She is always looking for an opportunity to get better and not settle for what she already has. Darelis has the mentality of being on the constant lookout for something better over the next horizon.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy pigs that she can feed and raise. Taking full advantage of her sales is the only way for her to make steady progress. Darelis remains firm in her quest to achieve a quality of life in which her family can live comfortably and not lack anything.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise.

loans.name: Nelly Auria

texts.es:
Nelly Aura tiene 58 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Nueva Arica, la cual es una zona rural, que se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, cosa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general en su domicilio, en la parte posterior tiene un corral donde se dedica a la crianza de (patos y cuyes), es una mujer emprendedora que se esfuerza en la labor que realiza, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de abarrotes que le permitirán tener una mayor cantidad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nelly Aura is 58 years old. She lives in the District of Nueva Arica, a rural area where the people engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located in Chiclayo Province, which is part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Nelly Aura sells groceries from her home. In an area behind her house, she has a pen where she raises ducks and guinea pigs. She is an enterprising woman who puts forth effort in the work she does. Nelly Aura is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1,500 PEN so that she can buy a large quantity of groceries. This will enable her to have a wide variety of products that she can offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy groceries to restock her business.

loans.name: Mabel Evelin

texts.es:
Mabel es una joven soltera de 26 años de edad sin hijos.
Ella finalizo sus estudios secundarios y por motivos económicos no pudo continuar con estudios superiores y se dedicó al comercio de artículos de bazar (regalos), ahora posee un puesto de venta con artículos novedosos y de gran rotación. El negocio se volvió familiar y también participan sus cuatro hermanos, comprando y trasladando la mercadería y a veces se ocupan de la venta directa de los productos.
Mabel siempre fue buena estudiante y nunca dejó que sus sueños de continuar con los estudios se acaben; “este emprendimiento en las ventas es un logro familiar y gracias a esto pondré en marcha mis sueños”.
Hace un par de años Mabel dio rienda suelta a sus sueños y se arriesgó a buscar una carrera técnica con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida. Ahora ella tiene nuevas necesidades como la compra de materiales de estudio e instrumentos de prótesis dental. Ella tiene la confianza para abrir un consultorio dental, para eso debe terminar primero su carrera y continuar con sus metas.
Es por esos motivos que Mabel solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de estudio e instrumentos de prótesis dental.
texts.en:
Mabel, 26, is single and has no children.  She finished her secondary education but was unable to continue her studies for economic reasons.  She began selling gift and bazaar items and now has a stall where she sells high turnover novelty items.  The business turned into a family activity where her four siblings also work, buying and transporting merchandise.  Sometimes they also handle direct sales of products.

Mabel was always a good student and never gave up on her dream to continue her education.  "This sales business is a family achievement and thanks to it I will be able to start going after my dream."

A few years ago Mabel set out in search of her dream and decided on a technical career to improve her quality of life.  Now she has new needs such as the purchase of study materials and instruments for dental prostheses.  She believes she can open a dental consultancy but first she must finish her education and continue with her goals.

Therefore Mabel is requesting a loan to buy study materials and instruments for dental prostheses.

loans.use: To buy study materials and instruments for dental prostheses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more green vegetables to expand her business.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: Delia es soltera, tiene 36 años y un hijo, ella vive con sus padres en la comunidad de Palomar en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su padre Delia tiene un bazar donde mayormente vende material escolar, Delia tambien ofrece en su bazar fiambres al publico Delia necesita un crédito para incrementar la mercaderia de su bazar. Delia es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Delia is 36 years old, single, and has a son. She lives with her parents in a brick and cement house that her father owns in the community of Palomar.

Delia has a bazaar where she sells mostly school supplies. She also sells cold cuts to the public from her establishment. Delia needs a loan so that she can increase the inventory in her bazaar. She is the only one generating income for her household, so she is in need of assistance.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her bazaar.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 24 años de edad trabaja como empleada en una empresa privada, vive en casa de un familiar con su esposo y su hijo, ella está solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder mejorar su vivienda ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para realizarlo, por esa razón solicita el crédito y asi poder comprar cemento, ladrillos, arena, hierro, cerámica, pago de mano de obra y hacer unas divisiones, repellar las paredes y poner piso cerámico, para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos.
texts.en:
The lender is 24 years old and is employed by a private company. She lives with her husband and daughter in a family member's house. She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to be able to improve the home.

With her earnings alone she can't achieve this goal, and for this reason she requests the loan with which she will buy cement, bricks, sand, iron, ceramic and labor costs to create subdivisions, tear down walls and lay down a ceramic floor, so that she and her family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, iron, ceramics and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Cleofer

texts.es:
Cleofer tiene 55 años de edad, vive en el caserío La Bocana – La Matanza, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de pescado, desde hace varios años, cuenta con clientela considerable, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 500 nuevos soles para la compra de materiales de construcción para arreglos de su vivienda y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Cleofer is 55 years old and lives in the village of La Bocana – La Matanza. This community is known for agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located in Morropon Province, which is part of the region of Piura on the northern coast of Peru.

Cleofer has been selling fish for several years and has a considerable clientele. He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2,500 PEN in order to buy construction materials for repairing his home. As a result, he can generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for making home repairs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cloths, sprays, creams, etc.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, por cuestiones económicas  y necesidades en el hogar no pudo continuar, por lo que se dedicó a trabajar, como motorista de carro. Está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a la comercialización de productos lácteos, compra la leche y ella elabora los derivados para la venta. Tienen dos hijos de 3 y 5 años de edad respectivamente.  
 

Mario por su parte se desempeña como motorista en una ruta de pick up, en el que hace un recorrido de unos 100 kilómetros. Tiene más de 6 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, un hermano que tenía un carro le enseño y luego lo empleo en su carro para que se lo manejara, no tiene más actividades a las que se dedique, el punto de partida donde inicia su día de trabajo lo tiene a unos 500 metros, el recorrido lo hace a pie hasta llegar donde esta el pick up que maneja, el horario de trabajo es de 5 am a 4 pm.

El préstamo será invertido en la reparación del techo de su casa, ya que se encuentra en mal estado y cuando llueve se moja adentro, y teniendo su esposa e hijos se vuelve incomodo estar en esa situación, lo que comprara es, madera y teja, también el pago de la mano de obra. La mejora que el préstamo hará es el poder tener el capital para realizar le mejora a la vivienda.
  
Desea poder tener primero lo más necesario para él y su familia, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida, el préstamo le ayudara en satisfacer la necesidad de la reparación de su vivienda. Con lo que genera del empleo lo utilizara para una parte para el pago de la cuota y lo demás para los gasto de la casa.
texts.en:
Mario is 27 years old and studied through the ninth grade. Due to financial circumstances and household needs, he was not able to continue. For this reason, he decided to work as a driver. Mario is in a relationship and his partner sells dairy products. She buys milk and uses it to make other products to sell. They have two children, ages 3 and 5 respectively.

In his work as a driver, Mario travels in a pick-up truck on his given route that measures about 100 kilometers. He has been in this line of work for more than six years. Mario learned to drive using his brother’s car and later began using his own vehicle. He has no other jobs. The place where he begins his workday is located approximately 500 meters away, so he must travel on foot in order to retrieve the pick-up truck that he will drive. His work schedule is from 5:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M.

His loan will be invested in repairs to the roof of his house, which is in bad condition. It leaks whenever it rains, which creates an uncomfortable situation for his wife and children. Mario will buy wood and tiles, as well as pay for labor. This loan will provide the capital he needs to make this home improvement.

Mario wants to provide the most urgent necessities for himself and his family. He hopes to continue working as long as God gives him health and life. This loan will satisfy his family’s need for home repairs. With what he earns from his job, Mario will set aside part of it for his loan payment and the rest will go toward household expenses.

loans.use: to buy wood and tiles, as well as pay for labor in order to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis tiene 52 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en el distrito de Colasay, una comunidad de clima variado su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 52 years old and lives with his wife and children in the District of Colasay. This community has a varied climate and the residents engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located in Jaén Province, which is part of the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

Luis is a farmer who specializes in cultivating coffee. He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1,500 PEN in order to buy compost for maintaining his crops. This will allow him to generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy compost for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es:
Noemí es una joven mujer de 23 años de edad, vive con su pareja y tiene dos hijos.
Ella junto a su familia vive en la comunidad de Batallas a una distancia de aproximadamente 3 horas de viaje desde la sede de gobierno de Bolivia ‘La Paz’. 
Ella se considera una firme empresaria y lleva adelante varios negocios relacionados a la artesanía en tuipaz. Su vida la lleva a cabo en completa armonía con la naturaleza, las labores del  día comienzan con el sonido de su gallo despertador, ella se asea y rápidamente enciende el fuego en su horno de barro para preparar el desayuno a su familia; “vivo con mucha tranquilidad el campo es silencioso, en la madrugada sólo se escuchan nuestro pasos y mi gallo ruidoso que cacarea” comenta.
Ahora su familia creció y se encuentra en la necesidad de ampliar su domicilio y su taller de artesanía.
Es por ese motivo que Noemí solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de construcción y así contar con más activos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Noemi is a young woman of 23 who lives with her partner and has two children,
She lives with her family in the community of Batallas, about three hours' travel from the Bolivian seat of government "La Paz."
She considers herself a firm businesswoman and she runs various businesses related to "tuipaz" crafts. She lives her life in complete harmony with nature: her daily work begins with the sound of her rooster waking her, and she washes and quickly lights the fire in her clay oven to make breakfast for her family. "I live a very tranquil life, the countryside is quiet, and in the morning the only sounds are our steps and my noisy rooster crowing," she says.
Now her family has grown, and she needs to enlarge her home and her crafting workshop.
This is why Noemi is requesting a loan to buy construction materials, so she can have more activities and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials so she can have more activities and improve her quality of life

loans.name: Ana Josefina

texts.es:
Ana, es casada, vive sola con su esposo en casa propia, donada por el gobierno nacional, es madre de tres hijos los cuales ya son totalmente independientes; su esposo practica la agricultura, mientras que ella se dedica a atender una venta de tortillas, así se apoyan mutuamente para cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
Utilizará el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de una plancha de cocina mucho más grande para tener una mayor productividad y abastecer a sus clientes, espera atraer más clientes y mejorar su situación económica para cancelar su deuda con un buen record crediticio.
Su sueño es mantener su negocio funcionando para apoyar a su esposo en los diferentes gastos del hogar y juntos tener  una vida más confortable.
texts.en:
Ana is married and only lives with her husband in a house that was donated to them by the national government. She is the mother of three children who are totally independent. Her husband works in agriculture while she manages her business of selling tortillas. She and her husband help one another with the household expenses.

Ana will use this loan to buy a larger cooktop so that she can achieve greater productivity and provide for her customers. She hopes to attract more customers and improve her financial situation so that she can repay her debt with a clean credit record.

Her dream is to maintain a functioning business so that she can help her husband with the various household expenses. Together they will be able to live a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy a larger cooktop for preparing tortillas.

loans.name: Jean Peare

texts.es:
Jean Peare es el tercero de cinco hermanos, vive en casa de sus padres con todos ellos menos el mayor que vive aparte. En casa solo trabajan su padre, mecánico, y su hermana que es vendedora, su madre es ama de casa y el y sus hermanos menores solo estudian.
El dinero no es suficiente para cubrir todos los gastos del hogar ademas de la educación de Jean Peare, por lo que pronto deberá de dejar sus estudios para empezar a trabajar, ya que su madre no puede hacerlo porque tiene que velar por sus dos hermanos menores y el dinero que juntan su padre y hermana no alcanza.
Es por esto que Jean Peare solicita la ayuda de los prestamistas de Kiva y les agradece de antemano cualquier ayuda que puedan brindarle para poder concluir sus estudios y ser un profesional con las herramientas necesarias para poder laborar y ayudar a su familia y a la educación de sus dos menores hermanos.
El piensa que la labor que realizan los prestamistas de Kiva es un gran aporte para la educación en el mundo, ademas de una tarea loable y digna de emular no solo por entidades benéficas sino también por los gobiernos y empresas privadas en todo el mundo para el bienestar de los millones de jóvenes en edad estudiantil.
texts.en:
Jean Peare is the third of five children. He lives at home with his parents and all of his siblings, except the oldest one who lives elsewhere. The only working one working at home is his father, who is a mechanic. His sister is a salesperson and his mother is a housewife. The younger siblings only attend school.

There is not enough money to cover all of the household expenses and pay for Jean Peare’s education. Therefore, he will have to quit his studies in order to begin working. His mother is not able to obtain a job because she must stay home and look after the two younger children. The income that both his father and his sister earn is not sufficient.

For this reason, Jean Peare is requesting the assistance of Kiva lenders. He expresses in advance his appreciation for any help that can be offered so that he can finish his studies and become a professional. With the necessary tools, he will be able to work and help his family, as well as provide for the education of his two younger siblings.

Jean Peare believes that the work being done by the Kiva lenders is a great contribution to the world of education. It is a laudable and noteworthy task that should be emulated, not only by other charities, but also by governments and private companies throughout the world for the benefit of millions of young students.

loans.use: to pay for his technical studies in computer support and maintenance.

loans.name: Mayram

texts.ru: Майрам ответственная и милая женщина. Ей 35 лет. Она с детьми живет в городе Душанбе. У Майрам сын и дочка. Они ученики средней школы. Майрам живет и работает, чтобы обеспечить своих детей и чтоб они не знали нужды. Майрам занимается продажей овощей на ранке. В этой сфере деятельности она около 10 лет. Причина, по которой она берет кредит, является приобретения нового товара и ремонта дома. Майрам на часть денег купить овощи, на другую часть отремонтирует дом. С такими планами она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
Mayram is a responsible and sweet woman. She is 35 years old. She and her children live in the city of Dushanbe. Mayram has a son and a daughter. They are middle school students. Mayram lives and works in order to provide for her children, so that they do not know what it is to be in need. 

Mayram sells vegetables in a market. She has been working in this business for around 10 years. The reason she is taking a loan is to purchase new stock and refurbish her house. Mayram will buy vegetables with part of the money and with the rest she will re-do her home. With these plans she has asked for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase new stock and refurbish her house

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
He is married and a father of four children. They live in a three-bedroom house in Bamenda Northwest Region of Cameroon. He has faced so many challenges in life. A few of these challenges are financial difficulties, sickness and the death of family members and love ones.

With this new loan he requested, he will buy books, plastic bags and other basic commodities like soap, sweets and maggi for his small store. He believes so much in the success of his business because he has been doing it for a long period of time. It is located at the center of the town. The community will benefit from his moderate price selling; and regular supply of items to his customers. He will also provide them with useful information on some harmful products like plastic papers.

With the profit made from this loan, he will pay his children's education and family bills. He will also save some for the rainy days ahead. He prefers a GHAPE loan because of the low interest rates, convenient repayment intervals and the training on health issues and management skills before the disbursement of loans.

loans.use: To buy books, plastic bags, savons and oil.

loans.name: Eseza

texts.en: Eseza lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is married with three children and all of them go to school. She takes care of additional family members. She operates a beauty salon at the market on both a retail and wholesale basis. She works seven days a week .She has been in this business for the last ten years. She earns additional income from renting houses. She has requested for a loan of Ugandan shillings 2,500,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy hair treatments, relaxers, shampoo, braids and weaves. Her major business challenges include seasonality and electricity. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a fridge to start serving drinks in her beauty salon. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and running water. Her monthly expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: buy hair treatments, relaxers, shampoo, braids and weaves

loans.name: Anthony Mbang

texts.en:
Anthony is married and the father of four children. He lives with his family in a two bedroom house in Bamenda North West Region of Cameroon. He has faced many challenges in life, including financial difficulties, sickness and death of family members and loved ones. 

With this new loan, he will buy and replace his old tools: his hand saw, pincher, jack, smooth jack and plank. He will also buy fowls and feed for his poultry farm. He believes in the success of his business for three reasons: he has been doing it for the past three years, it is located at the center of town and because he is a trained carpenter. The community will benefit from his moderate prices and goodwill, and he will also provide furniture for their houses.

As for the profit he makes from this loan, Anthony will use it to cover his children's education, medication and to extend his house both for family use and renting. He prefers GHAPE loans because of the low interest rates, convenient repayment intervals and also because the members are trained on marketing and management skills before the loans are disbursed.

loans.use: To buy tools such as a hand saw, pincher, jack, smooth jack, a plank. He will also use part of the loan to buy fowls and feed

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with eight children, none of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (grand children). She has a retail shop and has been in this business for the last few months. She has applied for a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT - SACCO to buy beans, flour, soap, peas, cartons of salt and crates of soda. Her major business challenge is transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to educate her children to university level. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and running water. Her main monthly expense is food.

loans.use: buy beans, flour, soap, peas, cartons of salt and crates of soda

loans.name: Edith

texts.en: Edith lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is single with four children - one of them goes to school. She has no additional family members. She sells charcoal at the market on a retail basis. She works seven days a week .She has been in this business for the last ten years. She earns an additional income from farming. She has requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT – SACCO to buy bags of charcoal. Her major business challenges are seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to invest more capital into her farming business. She lives in her own house. The family does not have access to electricity or running water. Her main monthly expenses are food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is married with two children and all go to school. She takes care of additional family members. She sells charcoal at the market on a retail basis. She works seven days a week .She has been in this business for the last three years. She has requested a loan of  700,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT – SACCO to buy bags of charcoal. Her major business challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to diversify into selling fruits and vegetables due to their high demand. She lives in a rented house where the family has no access to electricity or running water. Her main monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Mariam lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with five children and three go to school. She has no additional family members. She sells fruit and vegetables at the market on a retail basis. She works seven days a week. She has been in this business for the last eight years. She earns additional income from selling used clothes. She has requested a loan of 700,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT – SACCO to buy tomatoes, onions, cabbages, sweet potatoes, pineapples and watermelons. Her major business challenge is transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to make her business prosper. She lives in a rented house where the family has access to electricity but not running water. Her monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: buy tomatoes, onions, cabbages, sweet potatoes, pineapples and watermelons

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is married with three children and one goes to school. She has no additional family members. She is a poultry farmer. She operates her business on a retail basis and works seven days a week. She has been in this business for the last three years. She earns an additional income from tailoring. She has requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT – SACCO to buy materials for making clothes, as well as poultry vaccines and feed. Her major business challenge is transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to build rental houses. She owns her house and the family has access to electricity and running water. Her monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: to buy materials for making clothes, as well as poultry vaccines and feed

loans.name: Jayanti

texts.en:
Jayanti is a young housewife who is only 30 years old, with two children (one son and one daughter).  She is married to Suresh, age 34. They live in the small village of Khagrabari in Jalpaiguri district in their own house. Jayanti is uneducated and can sign her name only.  She got married at a very tender age. Her husband studied until  grade seven. One of their children is going to school and is in grade 2 and the other is too young for school.

Jayanti's husband has been running a business of renting decorative musical instruments such as sound systems, sound boxes, microphones, drums, and other items for any occasion like a marriage ceremony, political meetings, religious festivals, birthday parties etc.  He has worked in this business for many years and thanks to God and his dedication, he has managed to keep it going and meet the household expenses.

Lately his clientele has increased and every day the demand is greater.  His dream is to see his business flourish and he knows that for this reason, he has to invest a little more in purchasing more musical items, so that he can meet the demand. That is why Jayanti has made the decision to help her husband by taking a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner).  She planned to purchase more sound boxes, sound systems, dishes, and drums with the loan to attract more clients so she can achieve her goal of improving the quality of life of her family. In the future, she wants to purchase an auto- rickshaw with the additional profit earned.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase more sound systems, microphones and other decorative musical items

loans.name: Saniya

texts.en: Saniya lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with five children, three of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of any additional family members. Saniya operates a beauty salon at the market. She sells her products on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last 21 years and works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 300,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy braids, weaves, hair relaxers and oils. Her major business challenges are off and on electricity and seasonality. Saniya's goal is to buy more hand hair dryers to ease her work. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her major expenses include rent, power and school fees.

loans.use: To buy braids, weaves, oils and hair relaxers.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet lives in Kampala, Uganda .She is married with three children and all go to school. She has no additional family members. She sells fruit and vegetables from home on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last five years. She earns an additional income from selling charcoal from home. She has requested a loan of 1,400,000 UGX from MCDT - SACCO to buy tomatoes, oranges, pineapples, cabbages and watermelons. Her major business challenge is the fact that her products are perishable. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a plot of land. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and running water Her main expenses include rent and food.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, oranges, pineapples, cabbages and watermelons

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is single with two children who both go to school. She also takes care of additional family members. She operates a food stall at the market on a retail basis. She works seven days a week. She has been in this business for the last eight years. She earns additional income from farming. She has requested a loan of UGX 400,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy sweet potatoes, cassava, banana leaves and fresh beans. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her goal is to buy a plot of land. She lives in rented houses and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy sweet potatoes, cassava, banana leaves and fresh beans.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with four children and all go to school. She has no additional family members. She sells fruit and vegetables on a retail basis at the market. She has been in this business for the last nine months. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 300,000 Uganda shillings to buy tomatoes, oranges, pineapples, onions and cabbages. Her major business challenge is seasonality because it impacts the prices of her products. Her goal and aspiration is to increase her sales by getting more capital. She lives in her own house where the family does not have access to electricity or running water. Her main expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes, onions, oranges, cabbages and sweet potates

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is married with three children, two of whom go to school. She has no additional family members. Juliet sells charcoal at the market on a retail basis. She works seven days a week. She has been in this business for the last eight years. Juliet has requested a loan of UGX 200,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy bags of charcoal. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her goal is to educate her children to the university level. Juliet lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sugar, white rice, machetes, limes, sweet sauce, butter, chicken, soft drinks, juice, churros, bread, spaghetti, instant soup, sardines, seasonings, medicines, pills, beans, ham, detergent, bleach, cold cuts, flour and brooms for his business.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Mujeres De Fe Group

texts.es:
Banco Mujer Mujeres de Fe, es un grupo nuevo de la zona de Campo Cinco Cariari, conformado por 6 socias, en su mayoría familiares. Cuentan con un grupo muy motivado para emprender algo que sea de gran ayuda para ella y sus familias. Las actividades que van a desarrollar son agropecuarias y de pequeña industria. 
Jacqueline es una de las integrantes del grupo, tiene 36 años, es soltera y jefa de hogar, vive con sus 2 hijos, estudiantes de primaria y secundaria. Esta mujer muy luchadora y dedicada, siempre ha trabajado mucho para darle a sus hijos el sustento y el estudio. Incluso ella también estudia por las noches para terminar la secundaria.  
Este es el primer crédito que solicita, y lo va a invertir en la cría y desarrollo de pollos de engorde, tiene experiencia en ese negocio ya que alguna vez lo realizo y ahora quiere reiniciar la actividad productiva. Además ella también es comerciante, lo que representa otro ingreso económico para el núcleo familiar ya que es una mujer sola. 
Las aspiraciones y sueño de Jacqueline son muchos, entre esos están seguir apoyando a sus hijos en los estudios, concluir la secundaria ella también, lograr superación y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Banco Mujer Mujeres de Fe or Women of Faith Female Bank is a new group in the area of Campo Cinco Cariari, made up of 6 members, mostly family. They are a highly motivated group to undertake something that can be a great help for them and their families. The activities that they will develop are agricultural and small business.
Jacqueline is one of the members of the group. She is 36 years old. She is single and is the head of the house. She lives with her two children, students in elementary school and high school. She is a very hardworking and dedicated woman. She has always worked hard to give her children sustenance and studies. She is also even studying at night to complete high school.
This is the first loan that she is requesting. She is going to invest it in the breeding and fattening of chickens. She already has experience in this business. She has done it before and now wants to restart the productive activity. Additionally she is also a merchant, which represents another economic income for her immediate family, as she is a single mother. Jacqueline's aspirations and dreams are many. Among them are to continue supporting her children in their studies, to finish high school, and to achieve success and a better quality of life.

loans.use: En la compra de pollos, alimentos, concentrados y vitaminas para su desarrollo.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan de 39 años de edad vive con grupo familiar en casa propia, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, donde elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, ya se hizo de mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; Juan es un hombre muy trabajador, honesto y sobre todo humilde, quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital para la compra de material por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc.  él tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Juan is 39 years old and lives in the house that he owns with his family. Juan has an ironmongery workshop where he builds doors, balconies, bars and more. Juan has had this business for a number of years and has a lot of experience that helps him to improve at his work every day. Juan already has many customers. They prefer his services because of the quality of his work, the affordable prices and, above all, because he does the work according to the customer's tastes. Juan is very hard-working, honest and, especially, humble. He wants to expand his business but needs capital in order to buy materials. As a result he is applying for a loan from "Apoyo Integral". This loan will help him to buy metals, tools, and more. Juan has a good credit rating and is sure that he will be able to pay off his debt and, at the same time, bring more financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy metals, tools, and more.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Las Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
Doña Patricia es una de las integrantes de Banco Mujer La Triunfadoras, tiene 38 años, es divorciada, jefa de hogar y tiene 2 hijas, una de ellas estudiante de secundaria y la hija mayor está asistiendo a cursos técnicos para aprender una profesión y poder ayudar a su madre.
